Settings

Configure API keys, model defaults, search settings, and agent behavior. Personalize Lattice to match your workflow and preferences.

latticelab.io

API Key Management

Securely store and manage your API keys for different LLM providers. Keys are encrypted and stored locally - never sent to our servers.

  • Anthropic, OpenAI, Google API keys
  • Local encryption for security
  • Quick validation and testing

Model Defaults

Set your preferred default model and generation parameters. Choose between Fast & Cheap, Balanced, or Quality First presets.

  • Default provider and model selection
  • Temperature and max tokens settings
  • Fallback model configuration

Search & RAG Settings

Configure how Lattice searches your sources and retrieves relevant context. Fine-tune the balance between semantic and keyword search.

  • Hybrid search weight adjustment
  • Number of chunks to retrieve
  • Similarity threshold configuration

Agent Behavior

Customize how the AI research agent responds. Control verbosity, citation style, and reasoning transparency.

  • Response style preferences
  • Citation density control
  • Thinking trace visibility

Appearance

Customize the visual appearance of Lattice. Choose themes, font sizes, and panel layouts that work best for you.

  • Light and dark theme options
  • Font size adjustments
  • Panel layout preferences

Data & Privacy

Control your data and privacy settings. Manage local storage, export data, and configure what gets stored.

  • Local-first data storage
  • Export and backup options
  • Clear data and reset options

Customize Your Workflow

Configure Lattice to match your preferences and security requirements.
